response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This exceptional item is worth more than just its monetary value; it holds the potential to revolutionize how you operate or experience the world around you. I am confident that once you understand its capabilities and benefits, you will see its true worth far exceeding $1,500,000.

To make this acquisition possible, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone who recognizes its potential impact.

Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you would like to proceed with purchasing the product. I am here to answer any questions you might have and provide you with all the necessary information to make an informed decision.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your life or business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
